title: PsyOps Armchair with what / Logo Design General
content:
hi there. i'm working on a logo where i like to use psyops' armchair (haven't licensed it by now, so no example right now). it's a logo for a so called "lounge" bar. the logo itself is set in armchair b gauge an consits of 5 letters (a little bit streched). now it needs a small "lounge bar" claim.   
   
2 questions:   
   
1. any suggestions on what to pair it with (set "lounge bar" in)?   
2. logo design in general: what to give to the client if it's somekind of "pitch"? a pdf containing various versions of the logo (inverted and so on), watermarked, a copyright text, a description on how to use, ....????   
   
thanks: lars
author: lars
